DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate long term safety, efficacy and tolerability of ABT-874 in adults with moderate to severe psoriasis.
DOC.brief_title: Open Label Continuation Study in Moderate to Severe Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Having participated in a preceding ABT874 clinical trial for ABT874 Subject has a clinical diagnosis of moderate to severe plaque psoriasis Subjects who prematurely discontinued in any preceding psoriasis study with ABT874 other than protocolrequired discontinuation
